name: 理論地球物理學
goals: 學生經由報告和討論，訓練自己獨立思考、理解地球物理現象的背後物理意義，並尋求和其他學科的結合。
經由分組英文口頭報告和書面報告，訓練學生溝通、合作、組織的技巧。
討論迷思問題，經由歷史地震的構造背景、地震學意義、和社會衝擊進行探究
syllabus:
Lecture 1. Overview: Study of Earth Structures

Lecture 2. Overview: Earthquake Seismology

Lecture 3. Geodetic Overview GPS and Space-Based Geodetic Methods

Lecture 4. Steady State Overview

Lecture 5. Crust and lithospheric structure – Global crustal structure Natural source

Lecture 6. Fault Interaction, Earthquake Stress Changes and the Evolution of Seismicity Dynamic triggering

Lecture 7. Earth Tide

Lecture 8. Fracture and Frictional Mechanics

Lecture 9. Earthquake Museum of Taiwan

Lecture 10. Rate- and State-Dependent Friction

Lecture 11. Interaction of Solid Earth, Atmosphere and Ionosphere

Lecture 12. Episodic Aseismic Slip at Plate Boundaries

Lecture 13. Super volcano

Lecture 14. Complexity and Earthquakes

Lecture 15. Physical Processes that Control Strong Ground Motion

Lecture 16. Volcano Seismology

Lecture 17. Earthquake hydrology

Lecture 18. Final

methodologies.note: 課程內容包括理論地球物理的科學知識介紹與技術應用，先由老師介紹該週課程之重要性與導讀，最後一堂由學生輪流口頭報告
導讀教科書章節，並提供案例讓學生討論、收集資料、報告
增加課堂、課後及電腦實作時間，加深學習層次、有利問題之自發性與自我解決能力培養
學生人數若夠，會2-3人一組分組報告

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
